title: Very easy lamb pilaf
ingredients: ['1 large onion, finely chopped', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '400g diced lamb, trimmed of fat', '2 cloves garlic', 'salt, to taste', '1 tablespoon Tesco mild curry powder', '200g basmati rice', '400ml lamb stock', '200g chopped tomato', '8 semi-dried apricots, chopped', '2 tablespoons chopped fresh parsley', '1 tablespoon chopped fresh mint', '1 tablespoon toasted pine nuts']
